descriptions.SKILLED: Increases number of skill points to allocate by 2 per perk rank. (5 Ranks)
descriptions.SPECIALIST: Increases current greatest stat by 1.  Requires: Level 10
descriptions.SURVEYOR: Increases effective perception for scouting purposes by 2 per rank.
descriptions.STEALTHY: Increases effective agility for stealthing purposes by 2 per rank.
descriptions.EROTIC: Increases effective charisma for arousing others by 2 per rank.
descriptions.CATAMITE: Unlocks more options for being willingly receptive.
descriptions.QUICKFOOTED: Increases stability as if having higher agility by 2 per rank.
descriptions.COMBAT_FINESSE: Increases weapon skill bonuses as if having higher agility by 2 per rank.
descriptions.SUNDERER: Increases armor destruction on armor sundering attacks.
descriptions.VERSATILE: Decreases stability cost of techniques that change stance from Balanced stance.
descriptions.ITEM_MASTER: Adds a level of defense to item use.
descriptions.CUM_DRINKER: Restores a small amount of health when swallowing cum.
descriptions.FORAGER: Outcomes from foraging are more likely to be good.
